address.description: Ethereum address to send the data to, if a contract to update already exists.

functionID.description: Ethereum function ID to send the data to, if a contract to update already exists.

resultMultiplier.description: Amount to multiply the value passed in by. Allows for decimal value to be increased so that their precision is accounted for by integers. Defaults to 1.

value.description: Multiplied by the resultMultiplier and converted to an integer, then formatted to be written into Ethereum int256 format.
The input value passed in mutliplied by the resultMultiplier and converted to an integer.

txid.description: ID of the transaction that was written into Ethereum to create the update.
